Package controller

Class AddPartController

java.lang.Object
controller.AddPartController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AddPartController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This declares the class for the controller which manages all the functions of the add part screen.
